item.title: Practical Machine Learning
item.description: Machine Learning is transforming every industry. While there are great resources out there to learn concepts in Machine Learning, there aren’t many resources to learn how to code. This mini-course teaches cocepts in Machine Learning through code. No unnecessary theory, little to no math needed, and no prerequisites. No advanced coding skills required. This is a great resource to learn how to build your own models in python.
